directions: To make salad dressing, whisk together mayonnaise, lemon juice, Worcestershire and hot pepper sauce in small bowl. Refrigerate until ready to use.
Heat olive oil in large skillet. Stir-fry pork strips over medium-high heat until browned.
Layer pork strips over lettuce in large bowl. Top with croutons, cheese and pepper. Serve drizzled with salad dressing.
ingredients: 1 Smithfield® Peppercorn & Garlic Seasoned Pork Tenderloin, cut into thin strips
title: Pork Caesar Salad from Smithfield®
